user_review: This is place is fantastic. Their staff is very friendly and available to answer any question on their menu. Great service, amazing food. Their portions are very generous.The flavours you will find in this restaurant are very hard to find elsewhere.

I love this place!!!!!!! Their jjamppong is unique. You cant find that flavour anywhere else. The shrimp fried rice is delicious as well. Since it's a korean-chinese restaurant, don't expect to see any tteokbokki.

I want to give this place more than 5 stars!  Their jajjangmyon, jjambbong and tangsuyeok is the best I've ever had. The owner suggested steamed shrimp mandoo which tasted totally homemade! Waitress was very sweet and wonderful. They helped us find parking spots and gave us extra pickled radish. The owner lady treated us to a special desert she had made which was out of this world. If I am ever back in Montreal I'll definitely head straight to here!

I ordered takeout. The service was very good, the staff very nice. The food was just ok. We had the black beans noodles that I found were too cooked and pretty bland (it is the first time I have this type of plate, I don't know if they are meant to be like that). We also had a pork and noodle plate that was pretty good, but could also have used just a bit of more taste. For people eating out a lot and just wanting something in NDG, I think it is worth trying. The price is very reasonable. It is not a regular Korean restaurant though, so not the place to get your seafood pancake.
Love this place! My boyfriend and I always order for take out. Best Jajangmyeon in Montréal !

Great family restaurant. My kids love the hand made noodles and potstickers. My nephews finished the noodle soup in a heartbeat! Affordable prices and clean high chairs. Great location- a walk or bus away! Will definitely go back!
